summary: Team meeting consisted of brief introductions and role statements; no updates or blockers were raised. Team members offered responsibilities: PM to coordinate, Dev to take on blockers, QA to test when ready, and Architect to advise on architecture and NFRs.

actions.task: Collect updates and blockers from the team and coordinate next steps
Take on any assigned updates or blockers raised by the team
Perform testing on items that are ready and report results
Provide architecture, design decisions, and non-functional requirements guidance when requested

risks.risk: No updates or blockers were reported, which may delay identification and resolution of issues.
risks.mitigation: PM to proactively follow up for status updates; team members to raise blockers promptly and escalate to Alex or appropriate owner; QA to flag ready items for testing.
